contentrichtext.text: == Fair use rationale == {{Non-free use rationale| Article = Green Lantern in other media | Description = Screen capture of Green Lantern for either ''[[Justice League (TV series)|Justice League]]'' or ''[[Justice League Unlimited]]''. | Source = Apparent capture made by the original uploader [[User:Zanimum]]. | Portion = Single Frame. | Resolution = 300px size unsuitable to use for high end reproduction. | Purpose = Illustration of specific point within the article. | Replaceability = {{Comics-replaceability}} | other_information = {{DCAni-trademark-copyright|2001-2006}} }} ==Licensing== {{Non-free television screenshot|image has rationale=yes}} [[Category:DC animated universe screenshots and pictures|Green lantern (stewart, john)]]<!-- left in the parent as unclear which series this was taken from--> [[Category:Green Lantern images|Green lantern (stewart, john)]] {{comicsyrimage|2001|television|Justice league||in=y}}
